astroGenerator.enable: Enable or disable the Astro File Generator extension
astroGenerator.files.include: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is astro
astroGenerator.files.exclude: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files
astroGenerator.files.showPath: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files
astroGenerator.files.skipFolderConfirmat: Skip the destination folder confirmation when generating files
astroGenerator.formatting.headerCommentT: Header comment template to add to the top of the generated file
astroGenerator.formatting.insertFinalNew: Insert a newline character at the end of the file
viewsWelcome.astroGenerator.listFilesVie:
To effectively capture files, ensure you include the plural form of the file type within the workspace settings.
[Open Workspace Setting](command:workbench.action.openWorkspaceSettingsFile)
To learn more about how to use Astro File Generator for VS Code [read our docs](https://github.com/ManuelGil/vscode-astro-generator).
